Articles.Content: Long time lurker here, emerging from the shadows. I love this game and what it represents - space sandbox with no limits for the future. Anyway, hello guys ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hello fellow old time traveler! 

Welcome!
